creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: may be worn on top of head; roughly cone-shaped element of bent wood covered with tan fabric; rows of red and white beads, metal studs, white buttons and silver metallic plastic bands; loops and strands of beads at bottom and sides; strands of wooly red fibers with multicolored pompons at sides and back; multicolored paper streamers on back; loop of coins and buttons
medium: Wood, cotton, buttons, beads, plastic, synthetic fibers, coins, paper, bells
title: Head covering (?)
